Additional Comments: We contacted scholastic about how to access the Thanksgiving videos we have used for years for our Thanksgiving unit.  They sent us an email saying they would look into it, but then that was 2 weeks ago and haven't heard anything.  Those video are such a wonderful tool full of wonderful information for kids learning about The First Thanksgiving.  It's such a shame not to have access to a great resources that Scholastic has spent a lot of time on.  I would really appreciate a response if possible and thank you for creating such a wonderful tool.
I had answers to my questions quickly and had no problems with our interaction.

I'm waiting on the first broom book that was never shipped with our last order. She said she was sending my a confirmation/order number via email.  I haven't received it yet.  This was the 2nd time I did a live chat about the same thing.

I'm waiting on the first broom book that was never shipped with our last order. She said she was sending my a confirmation/order number via email.  I haven't received it yet.  This was the 2nd time I did a live chat about the same thing.

Apparently my order was not submitted properly through the teacher and instead of sending my $51 book order to my home free of charge do to the mistake that was not on my part they just chose to canceled my order.
I was unable to stay on the line due to my students' schedule, and my customer service representative emailed me with a resolution for my issue.

Please have the Scholastic Virtual Tour videos in a readily available place on the Scholastic website. I  wanted to get the location of the Scholastic Virtual Field Trips on the Mayflower and Plimoth.  We have viewed these for quite a few years, and it is not readily available this year. Very disappointing.
I received a very fast response!
My problem was fixed and I was highly satisfied.
Your response was prompt and helpful. I have no suggestions.
Quick, very friendly/personable, and efficient!! Excellent.

My purchase was done through the Book Club and listed a teacher from my school.  But now we are unable to finalize the purchase because she's not active.  There was no other solution other than make contact with that teacher.  I'm not sure why someone at your location just couldn't push it through.
Given me a receipt for the transaction amount that was put on my business credit card.
I was not able to add funds to my wallet.

I originally called because a parent tried to order online, but she couldn't find my name.  The first customer service person switched me from a teacher to a parent, so I called again.  The second customer service agent switched me back to a teacher and said my name should be on the school roster.  My name is still missing.  And yes, I know that I can give parents the class code, but many times, they lose it and just want to be able to find name name.

I originally called because a parent tried to order online, but she couldn't find my name.  The first customer service person switched me from a teacher to a parent, so I called again.  The second customer service agent switched me back to a teacher and said my name should be on the school roster.  My name is still missing.  And yes, I know that I can give parents the class code, but many times, they lose it and just want to be able to find name name.

I was looking at the menu bar to find order history.  I never thought to look higher up on the screen and click under my name .  It might help more customers if the order history is located somewhere on the menu bar.  I do appreciate finding out how to find it.  thanks.

I had 2 conversations with "live" people and they were very nice. have your system have the flexibility to adjust the order in a timely manner. I hit order then realized I was short books one hour later. It would have been nice to be able to adjust.

I was never notified that an order was placed on this account. Your representative got back to me quickly but it's a little early to see if we receive the order, and to see what the parent was charged.
I realized I had set an access point as my delivery place. I had been waiting for my book box and it was waiting for me to pick it up. I will go pick it up and return that one to scholastic.
My student did not receive her order even though it was printed on the order form. Now she has to wait another 7-10 days.
I was shocked to get a reply and a fix within about five minutes of sending my email! Way to go, Scholastic!
The "free" book for orders above $25.00 was no longer available.  I requested options but have not gotten a response.
The "free" book for orders above $25.00 was no longer available.  I requested options but have not gotten a response.

Everyone has been kind, but I still don't have my order.  It has been "processing" for two weeks.  Then we decided to cancel it and reorder.  So far, I see no evidence of this happening.  Order number 71256575.  I still want it, but I'd like to have it sooner rather than later.  Thank you.
Response was very short and seemed abrupt.

The only issue I have is when I ordered books I spent $29 in order to get the free $5 book. And then to come to tell me that that book is no longer available and I will not be able to get another free book but give me a code for $5 free book on my next purchase me and I have to spend more money to get a free book that we should have received or compensated me what a choice of another free book cuz therefore I would not have spent all that money in order to get the free book that my granddaughter wanted. So it's like telling me I have to spend more money to get a free book which I shouldn't have to there should have been some type of money taken off of my order or a option of here goes a couple free books that you can receive now
Thank you so much for being so quick to respond and so kind to immediately send the books that were left out of our order.
I look forward to receiving the book that was missing from my order  Thank you for your very quick response to resolve my concern
I wanted to switch a bonus item two minutes after ordering and it wasn't possible.
My free book with 25 purchase was out of stock and canceled but another book was not sent in its place.

I contacted Scholastic this morning (11/14) because I received an additional student order and wanted to add it to the order I had placed over the weekend.  The woman whom I spoke with from Scholastic was very short and somewhat rude to me and said she could not add this additional order to my order.  I asked if I had to make a separate order and if she could take it the order for me.  She said I could just do it online.  I asked if she could take the order over the phone and she said she could if necessary.  I had waited on hold for 10 minutes and needed to get back to work so I told her nevermind, I would take care of it myself.  I have been using Scholastic for many years and this is the first time that anyone has ever been so unhelpful and unfriendly.  I was quite disappointed.

Although the issue of where in processing my order was at, I feel there was a breakdown in communication between Scholastic and the teacher. She had no idea an order had been placed by me and therefore was unaware that she even had an account. Surely when an order is placed by a parent or guardian an automatic email should alert the teacher???

I want my order canceled.  I requested that it be canceled immediately after ordering it, yet due to the fact that customer service only works certain days, and the warehouse is open every day, my order processed before anyone was able to cancel it.  I believe the company needs an option on their website to cancel an order.

It would be very helpful if book box could be addressed to the teachers name because the school name and street address is only what's on the box. People at our school have to open the box to find a paper order to see who the box belongs to because the box isn't addressed to anyone
There was a wrong selection of books, but when I contacted customer service, they sent me the correct books. Thank you so much. Lori LaRonde
I would like to recommend that the book The One and Only Ivan be added back to book clubs, along with The One and Only Bob.  Thank you.

Nothing happens when I click on the "email" button when trying to "share now" information with families.  I have received an email saying "I'm very sorry the Email option is not working for you to share the Letter to Parents. Currently, this is an issue we are working to resolve that occurs when using the Google Chrome browser. If this is the browser you are using, please try another one. If you were not using the Google Chrome browser, please respond with the browser that is being used." I will let them know that we are using Chrome but I have not tried it wth Microsoft Edge and had the same problem
I said in email I didn't have time to call in and you emailed me back to tell me to call in. Lol
I was extremely impressed with how quickly my inquiry was answered. I also appreciate the response and helpfulness to help me resolve the situation! Really impressive customer service experience.

Mail out invoices!!  How do you expect tp be paid without invoices. Just send out invoices when the orders ship.  Over the past 2 years I have spent countless hours chasing down invoices for orders that are several months old.  Do you want to be paid??

The multiple emails from different departments was a bit confusing. I was receiving responses from 2 people in 2 departments it seemed like.  I responded to both interactions but I was a little confused on who was really helping me, even though both did have the same answers.

I needed to make some changes to my account...getting it completed was a little bit difficult.  I had to call 3 times in order to  get the problem completed correctly.  The last person with whom I spoke was very good about getting the problem corrected thoroughly.
I have no additional comments. Free Shipping and a choice for at least one $`1 chapter book.

More clear method on ordering Book Club books with points + Purchase Orders. Delay of placing the two orders attempting to be placed by the same teacher resulted in unavailable titles & inability to use earned points.

You have too many departments and your Purchase Orders does not get to the right department, your order vanishes and never gets filled instead of letting us know it was sent to the wrong department.    You have over 5- 8 different places to send a Purchase Order.  If I had any control I would not order from your company.
Site navigation, I could not find where to add parent emails.
My question was answered minutes after my email was sent.   Great service
Understanding the rules for using the book club.
I think my issue is resolved. But I won’t know until I received the replacement item.
Why have online chat and can't answer questions. Answer the question
I appreciate that Scholastic immediately sent the missing item.

I keep getting Scholastic  News and Scholastic Book Club emails to my home email instead of my work email.  My account only shows my work email.  I do not want these emails going to my home email, ONLY my work email.
The customer service rep was empathetic and solved my issue.

I received incorrect information! I asked if I could ship an order directly to a family and was told no, it was not available. I let the parent know and made arrangements for her to pick the order up before school once it had arrived.  The parent placed an online order and I received notification that it would be shipped directly to her at the address she provided. This was after I told her I researched it and it wasn't possible to do based on my live chat experience.

Today I went to my grandson's bookfair and saw there were fewer books available.  When I questioned why, I quickly learned that they had to go with a smaller company because of the contents of the books Scholastic Book Clubs presented.  I was appalled that you would present books to a Christian School that had subjects like "two dads", "two moms" and other inappropriate and disturbing subjects for children.    Obviously your company standards have become woke and liberal of which I will not take part in. Addressed the issue/complaint rather than just pass the buck to corporate.

I won’t be ordering from you anymore, it’s a shame no one could help me with my problem. Contacted the teacher to figure out what went wrong on your end when the teacher has record of placing the order guess you are out of luck when you use cash! Also, timely shipments that doesn’t take 2 months to receive

I'd ordered my kids' books weeks ago; it never updated the tracking via your site or USPS, nor ever picked up. I'd emailed you twice about this, the first time not getting a response, and the second time just telling me what I already knew about the tracking lack of update. It finally does update and gets moving to my destination, but now, two days later when it's finally supposedly at my post office, it's STILL not moving from said facility and eventually arriving. I'd just received a package which was at the same pace of delivering as these books and waiting to be accepted, yet these books are still in 'pending' for acceptance. After all this, if I ever receive my books or not, I don't think I'll ever buy online here again.

The customer service agent was very helpful and responded quickly to my questions.
She got back to me right away!
Thank you fro all your help

My concern is having to contact Scholastic every single time we make a purchase for our classroom with a PO to get a tax exempt invoice.  We deal with hundreds of vendors, and not a single one makes us do this.  When paying with a PO, it should be a standard practice of yours to send us an invoice without tax without your customer having to send an extra email asking you to do your job.  You have our tax letter on file.  Why do we have to keep asking you to look at it.
Your representative helped with suggestions when she really didn’t need to, so I appreciate that.

You need to coordinate with the school better so the order is submitted in a more timely fashion so the books ordered are available. I'm not sure the $5 credit I got when combined with the $6 I'm not being charged will get me 2 books with shipping? I like to get what I bought not find out 50 days after the order its not available.
Great customer service and prompt timing of receiving books this year!
Had my books sent to me right from the beginning

Make it clear on how to order from paper fliers and the shipping costs associated so teachers can make parents aware of this; or build it into the book fees so teachers are not caught off guard when trying to place a paper order.
None - my experience was easy and quick!
The resources I used for years are no longer accessible online and that was not able to be resolved.
The representative was able to solve my problem quickly. Thank you!

I did a September classroom order. Some parents paid with check or cash. It was lost in the mail and I have a $76 balance. I've asked the parent who wrote a check to write another and will get it mailed. I don't know what to do about the lost cash. I won't ever send cash again but that doesn't fix the problem for right now. I don't think I should be responsible for paying whatever is left of my balance. I have used Scholastic for 9 years and always had a good experience with customer service, but I don't know how to solve this problem. This is the second time I have contacted Scholastic about the issue with no resolution.

The customer service was easy, quick, and prompt. I appreciate the great customer service that I was provided.
Make sure I was clear what was happening before the chat was terminated.  It was done so quickly.

The book I selected for free with my last purchase was out of stock by the time the order was submitted by my daughter’s school.  Rather than have the option to select a replacement for it, I was provided a code for another free book with a future order. It was a disappointing resolution, which will make me less likely to purchase books through this path in the future.  However, the rep on Scholastic’s side was pleasant to work with (no complaints against her).
Sheila was VERY helpful!  Thank you!  (I am sorry the line disconnected)!

I have used Scholastic for 30 or more years and I have always been satisfied. I understand that the delivery person does not like to get into the car line in the morning and I understand. He or she needs to come after 7:45 perhaps when most cars have come and gone. This school is a charter with no buses. I am working with first graders and prefer Seesaw magazines each month.
Speedy replies - polite and fixed my problem immediately - so very helpful!

The person I chatted with was nice but was unable to help me.  My question/concern is why some book packs can be gotten with bonus points and why some can not.  I was looking to get my students a book for their holiday gift, so the pack of winter themed books was a great deal.  16 books for  $20.  I have earned the bonus points and so I feel I should be able to use them on a deal like this.  Also, I don't feel like you should have to have a purchase of $75 to unlock the dollar books.  I did send order forms home with my students and I only had 1 student purchase books.  In the past I have had that happen and their total wasn't $25 so I actually had to pay the shipping.

I wish I had not had to ask the question in the first place.  I was hoping the status of my order would be more clear or an estimated date of arrival would have been given when I ordered.  I did receive an email today.  I also would have liked the agent to give a little more detail instead of short answers so I did not have to g=keep asking follow-up questions.  I was not trying to be difficult, I have not ordered in a while and really did need to know the shipping information
I am trying to print the letter for my parents and it is showing a different teachers name.

I reached out to remove sales tax from a purchase since we are an exempt school. The person I spoke to said they would send me a new invoice without the tax and I never received it. Therefore, I cannot be 100% sure that the sales tax was removed.

I reached out to remove sales tax from a purchase since we are an exempt school. The person I spoke to said they would send me a new invoice without the tax and I never received it. Therefore, I cannot be 100% sure that the sales tax was removed.
I felt service rep was rude and didn't care to explain beyond yes or no answers or offer any help. Sad since I've been a customer for 27 years and I'm going to place a $700-$800 order.
I was on hold and the music stopped and no one returned.  This has happened before and I have tried to get the issue resolved for over a week.  Please call me at 717-219-9383.
The first time I called I had to call back because I was on hold for so long
It was an easy and pleasant experience using the Chat feature.

There is an amount due that does not make sense and the representatives cannot explain it.  The first call in Sept she was going to get back to me, the second call this week she said that some of my bonus points used did not cover books, so I was charged.  I never received bonus points back and was not told during checkout that the could not be used on certain items, so do not feel that I should have to pay for them.  The bonus points that were deducted were more than the ones used.  Both times the representitves told me you went to a new system, but so far nobody can give me a straight answer on the amount due.  Very disappointed.
